dcterms:creator: D. Anguita
A. Ghio
L. Oneto
dcterms:description: A public domain dataset for human activity recognition using smartphones, consisting of mobile phone accelerometer and gyroscope data collected from 30 individuals. The dataset is used to classify various activities, including sitting gestures, based on feature vectors derived from time and frequency domain variables.
dcterms:title: Mobile phone accelerometer and gyroscope data for human activity recognition
